Interface MosaicSearchCriteria

Defines the params used to search mosaics. With this criteria, you can sort and filter mosaic queries using rest.

Hierarchy

  • SearchCriteria
    • MosaicSearchCriteria

Index

Properties

Properties

Optional offset

offset: undefined | string

Inherited from SearchCriteria.offset

  • Defined in infrastructure/searchCriteria/SearchCriteria.ts:42

Entry id at which to start pagination. If the ordering parameter is set to -id, the elements returned precede the identifier. Otherwise, newer elements with respect to the id are returned. (optional)

Optional order

order: Order

Inherited from SearchCriteria.order

  • Defined in infrastructure/searchCriteria/SearchCriteria.ts:25

Sort responses in ascending or descending order based on the collection property set on the param ''order''. If the request does not specify ''order'', REST returns the collection ordered by id. (optional)

Optional ownerAddress

ownerAddress: Address
  • Defined in infrastructure/searchCriteria/MosaicSearchCriteria.ts:28

Filter by owner address

Optional pageNumber

pageNumber: undefined | number

Inherited from SearchCriteria.pageNumber

  • Defined in infrastructure/searchCriteria/SearchCriteria.ts:35

Filter by page number. (optional)

Optional pageSize

pageSize: undefined | number

Inherited from SearchCriteria.pageSize

  • Defined in infrastructure/searchCriteria/SearchCriteria.ts:30

Number of entities to return for each request. (optional)
